bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Air Interface for Broadband Wireless Access Systems--Amendment 4: Fixed and Mobile Wireless Access in Channel Bandwidth up to 1.25 MHz
IEEE Standard for Air Interface for Broadband Wireless Access Systems--Amendment 4: Fixed and Mobile Wireless Access in Channel Bandwidth up to 1.25 MHz
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 802.16s-2017 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.16-2012 as amended by IEEE Std 802.16p-2012, IEEE Std 802.16n-2013, IEEE Std 802.16q-2015)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: WirelessMAN-OFDMA TDD operation in exclusively licensed spectrum with channel bandwidth from 100 kHz up to 1.25 MHz, including 1 MHz explicitly, is specified. This amendment targets operation in the 700 MHz band but also supports operation in other VHF/UHF bands. The project amends Clause 12 of IEEE Std 802.16-2012, adding a new system profile and amending other clauses as required to support the narrower channel widths. The range and data rate supported by the added profile are commensurate with those of the base standard, as scaled by the reduced channel bandwidth.

WirelessMAN-OFDMA TDD operation in exclusively licensed spectrum with channel bandwidth from 100 kHz up to 1.25 MHz, including 1 MHz explicitly, is specified. This amendment targets operation in the 700 MHz band but also supports operation in other VHF/UHF bands. The project amends Clause 12 of IEEE Std 802.16-2012, adding a new system profile and amending other clauses as required to support the narrower channel widths. The range and data rate supported by the added profile are commensurate with those of the base standard, as scaled by the reduced channel bandwidth.
